00034 //! class Eval_Turbulence<br>Implements all stuff related to turbulence for VDF evaluators.
00035 
00036 class Eval_Turbulence
00037 {
00038 
00039 public:
00040   virtual ~Eval_Turbulence() {}
00041 
00042   inline virtual void associer_loipar(const Turbulence_paroi_scal& loi_paroi)
00043   {
00044     loipar = loi_paroi;
00045   }
00046 
00047   inline void update_equivalent_distance( ) ;
00048 
00049 protected:
00050   REF(Turbulence_paroi_scal) loipar;
00051   VECT(DoubleVect) equivalent_distance;
00052 };
00053 
00054 inline void Eval_Turbulence::update_equivalent_distance( )
00055 {
00056   if (loipar.non_nul())
00057     {
00058       int s=loipar->tab_equivalent_distance_size();
00059       equivalent_distance.dimensionner(s);
00060       for(int i=0; i<s; i++)
00061         {
00062           equivalent_distance[i].ref(loipar->tab_equivalent_distance(i));
00063         }
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 #endif
